texts.description: The file defines MetraOffer errors. The error message are localized.

text.value: [IT]The system was unable to process your request. Please have your administrator check the system logs.
[IT]Billing Cycle error, the first day of the month should not be greater or equal to the second day of the month.
[FIELD_NAME] [IT]must be specified.
[IT]Date input is invalid. Please check the values.

[IT]Warning: you are setting an effective date in the past, and this might cause problems with sessions that have been already metered in. Click on OK again to proceed with these dates, or set new dates in the future.
[IT]Start Date must be earlier than End Date.
[IT]Please select a [TEXT_KEYTERM_RATE_SCHEDULE] before clicking [TEXT_OK].
[IT]One or more enumeration value were ignored
[IT]Each adjustment must have at least one reason code
[IT]Effective and availability dates may not be empty.
[IT]Bulk Subscription Changes may not be made if the Destination [TEXT_KEYTERM_PRODUCT_OFFERING] contains any [TEXT_KEYTERM_UNIT_DEPENDENT_RECURRING_CHARGES].
[IT]Details
[IT]Cannot find the item for ID:
[IT]No [TEXT_KEYTERM_PARAMETER_TABLES]
[IT]The start date value is invalid
[IT]The end date value is invalid
[IT]The start date must be before the end date
[IT]The start date is in the past, this might cause information loss.
[IT]The end date is in the past, this might cause information loss.
[IT]The source product offering and destination product offering must have the same partition.
[IT]Please note:
